snippet.title: Donkey Kong Vs Pacman  (Donkey Kong Redux Gameplay Video and Download Link)
snippet.description:
Game Development home page with download link:
https://80s-arcade-games.itch.io/donkey-kong-redux



With this project I am trying to replicate the behaviour of the original Donkey Kong by Nintendo.

Game copyrights belong entirely to Nintendo.

As a Nintendo's games lover I wanted to express my tribute to the Mario/Donkey Kong serie and to game designer Shigeru Miyamoto.

Game programming is now completed and I added two brand new levels. More to come.  





Current version:  Final 1.4


Game features:
- Game is designed at its original resolution of 224x256 pixels at 60 FPS
- All 4 original levels  +  2 New levels
- Game logics, controls, collisions
- Difficulty increases each time player completes level 4
- Score saving (it saves scores in clear ini file)
- Online score saving
- Animations and scripted sequences among levels
- Enemies (Barrels, Fires, Springs,Cement Pies,Fireballs, Fireghosts)
- Full Sounds and Music
- Joypad support
- Arcade/Redux Mode


Arcade Mode lets you play the original 4 levels in the same order as in the Jap version of DK.  Name and Score are saved only if higher than 5th place

Redux Mode features 2 new levels  after completing level 4.  Name and Score are saved regardless to their values





Play instructions
Game Controls
Arrow Keys/Joypad Left stick:            Movement
CTRL/Joypad B0/B1                                 Jump
CTRL/Joypad B0/B1/Space/Enter:  Start Game - Skips Presentation/Cut Scenes
P:                                                                           Pause Game
ESC:                                                                     Exit Game
S:                                                                           Toggle FPS display on screen
I:                                                                            Toggle image color interpolation (Blur filter)
D:                                                                          Toggle Vsync (Disabled by default)
A:                                                                          Toggle Alternate Sync Method (Enabled)
F:                                                                           Toggle FullScren mode (Enabled by default)
